body.name: Gloria Vanderbilt Women's Amanda Classic High Rise Tapered Jean
features: STYLE - Classic high rise taper jean sits at natural waist with functional pockets, easy zipper fly and belt loops for the fit you love.
VERSATILITY - Goes great with all tops from fashionable to basic T-shirts and all footwear from stylish boots to your favorit shoes.
LENGTH - This high rise pant have a 31 inch average inseam, 29 inch short inseam and 33 inch long inseam with a 15 inch leg opening.
BRAND - Effortlessly fun and stylish Gloria Vanderbilt is a versatile yet classic look that attracts and connects with the modern sensibility of consumers of all ages.
body.description: Gloria Vanderbilt's # 1 selling women's jean in America with over 60 million sold nationwide the Amanda Classic High Rise Tapered Jean. This pant sits at your natural waistline with fully functional pockets, easy front zipper fly, belt loops for your favorite belt and contoured hips for that comfort fit you've come to love. Pairs great with all tops from fashionable to your basic tee shirt and all footwear from stylish heels and trendy boot to your favorite flats! The Amanda high rise Jean gives you the mid section confidence you want and versatility you need in any wardrobe, perfect to wear to work, attending a class or spending time with friends for family. Available in various colors, prints, embroidery and embellishments. Effortlessly fun and stylish. A versatile yet classic look that attracts and connects with the modern sensibility of consumers of all ages.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Gloria Vanderbilt, well-known for the Amanda Jean; America’s original slimming jean, has stood the test of time as one of the largest denim brands in North America. Today the brand encompasses a wide range of fits with quality fabrics, updated washes and fashionable details. Gloria Vanderbilt; long known for its best in class fit, has now expanded beyond their well-loved denim and colored bottoms to include: jackets, knits and woven tops to bring you effortless fun and style. Gloria Vanderbilt: America’s Original Designer Jean The brand started in 1976 between Gloria Vanderbilt and designer Mohan Murjani. Known for its fit, signature Gloria Vanderbilt embroidery and swan logo Our Brand's Most Famous Style To Date: Amanda Classic Tapered Jean - The original slimming jean. It seems to instantly flatten your tummy, creating flawless curves. Designed to sit perfectly at natural waist line, eliminating any unsightly muffin tops. Our jeans run from 4 to 18 in Missy, 4P to 16P in Petite and 14W to 24W in Plus size with some styles offered also in short and long length to suit all body types at any age.

Amanda Classic Curvy Skinny Amanda Boot Cut Amanda Button Down Shirt Shape Effect Pull On Straight Avery Pull On Style: The Original Fit Solution Jean that seems to flatten your tummy, creating flawless curves and eliminating any unsightly muffin tops Great Shaped Motion Flex Skinny; engineered with secret slimming panels in stretch denim with amazing recovery to look as fabulous as you’ll feel Sculpt stretch premium denim leg-lengthening boot cut style flatters every body type and may help you feel inches taller with or without the heels Button front shirt that can easily be dressed up or worn casually with Swan Monogram . Confidence in Full Effect; with a Pull on style with hidden elastic waist and comfortable stretch that covers allover. Contour Ultra Flex Pull On sculpting you to look your very best from every angle. Get the look of a jean with the comfortable ease of a pull on Description: Classic fit tapered leg, sits at natural waist, zipper fly and belt loops. Offered in Missy Sizes, Petite Sizes and Plus Sizes Contoured from hips to hemline, Mid Rise sits slightly below waistline, Functional five pocket styling, Zipper fly and belt loops. Offered in Missy Sizes and Petite Sizes Sits at natural waist, zipper fly and belt loops, slim through hips and thighs for a more modernized boot cut body, slimming silhouette and wide leg opening. Offered in Missy Sizes and Plus Sizes Classy feminine cut button up front shirt with tab roll sleeves, collar neck and side slits with high low curved hem. Comfort waist pull on jean sits at natural waist providing the coverage and flexability you want in a slim straight body Comfortable waistband sits slightly below natural waistline, Slim fit throughout from hips to ankles, Faux fly. Offered in Missy Sizes Front Rise: 11 1/4 " 9 3/4 " 11 1/4 " 11 1/4 " 10 1/2 " Average Length: 31 " 30 " 32 " 29 " frt / 30.5 " bk 30 " 30 " Multiple Lengths: ✓ ✓ ✓ Petite / Plus Sizes: ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓
Gloria Vanderbilt - A versatile yet classic look that attracts and connects with the modern sensibility of consumers of all ages

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Still love them.
reviews.reviewText: These are truly my favorite jeans. They fit at the waist which is why I am always looking for a good sale and buy them whether I need them or not. The fit is consistent and the stretch is just enough to make the fit comfortable. I like to buy long/tall and regular but could only get these in a regular. I will wear these with sandals or boots. I don't like the look of a lot of sock showing when I sit down. The regular length is fine when I am standing but pulls up just a little too far when I sit but the regular length is better when I wear boots or sandals. That's why I like to own multiple pairs. So, I will continue to look for this particular color in a tall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and Durable!!!
reviews.reviewText: I've owned many pairs of Gloria Vanderbilt jeans over the years. I added 3 more pairs about 6 months ago - Black, Scottsdale Wash, and Rinse Noir Wash.I like these jeans because not only are they stylish and versatile, they're also durable and comfortable and fit well.They look great dressed up in heels or boots or dressed casual with sneakers and a T-shirt. There are so many colors and different washes available too. For the reasonable price, I am able to keep adding to my collection.Long term they hold up well to regular washing and don't seem to shrink in fit or length. I also don't notice any fading, even in the dark washes or black.I like the gold colored stitching used on the blue washes that I bought (Scottsdale Wash and Rinse Noir Wash). I think it makes a nice contrast.The workmanship is very good and the quality seems to hold up over time. The stitching is strong and the zippers work well.I love the fit of these jeans. I sometimes end up with jeans that have a gap around my waist. This isn't the case with these jeans, so I can go without a belt. This is nice because then I can wear longer shirts without a lump from my belt showing through.The material of the Black pair is a soft brushed type. It does sometimes attract more lint because of this.I bought my usual size in these and I think they fit true to size. I do think these run a little longer than other brands in length. However, I think they are the perfect length for heels and boots without being too long for flat shoes.One thing that I find inconsistent between the various colors and washes is the waist size. I added a picture to show the difference between the three pairs even though they are all the same size.Overall, I highly recommend these jeans!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Fit & Durability
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased these jeans in department stores for many years but they have gotten very expensive. When I saw these at such a great price I purchased 2 pair, a week apart because I wanted to make sure they fit.The first pair was the black and exactly like the blacks I have purchased in Belk, Kohl’s and Penny’s, they run a little smaller but since I have lost 42 pounds over the last 7 months I was ok if they were smaller so I would have something for when I get down to a smaller size. To my surprise, the black pair actually wasn’t that much smaller than my other 16W that I had purchased fromBelk and at Kohl’s in December, once I lose 5 more pounds they will fit great in the waist.I decided to order another pair, this time in Portland Wash, a darker blue, these fit wonderfully. I will say I did order a 16W short and these are average but since I can sew, it won’t be a big deal to cut it down and sew it to be the correct length.I just wish I could get a 14W for when I reach my next goal but I will go into a local store and try on the misses size to see what size I need to order from Amazon. Super fast delivery, even on the last one that indicated I wouldn’t receive it until 1/23-1/31, I actually received it in 3 days.These jeans are perfect for a 72 year old woman to wear, very comfortable and flattering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2018
reviews.reviewText: Fits well just a little to long for 5’5”. Very comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I always like Gloria Vanderbilt jeans
reviews.reviewText: I always like Gloria Vanderbilt jeans, it's just not always easy to buy on line as is from store directly. Most of time though I'm happy, but since have had to get in better shape for health issues and have. I didn't do as good od job as normal picking out correct size. But still wear w/ belt now, they're as comfortable as I use too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Try before you buy!
reviews.reviewText: First off, ignore the “plus size” in the description. I have no idea why that’s included in it. Though there is a wide range of sizes available for these jeans, they are not exclusively plus size!Also…these are *not* tapered, but rather boot cut style. I’ve worn tapered for years. Tapered are cut much narrower to the ankle. While I’d rather prefer it, it seems you can no longer find the actual tapered style any more. I’ve not only searched here, but on eBay and in Kohls. Guess the manufacturer decided the description “boot cut” was less appealing, and now just call the formerly known boot cut style “tapered” (and thus, cut out having both styles, like they have for years). Par for the course on most everything these days, it seems.ALSO…I would strongly use the “try before you buy.” I bought a pair of these in April in size 10, they fit great. Now in November I bought a pair in size 10, too small in the waist, so I had to return and get a size 12. My figure/weight has *not* changed in that timeframe, so it makes no sense. But in recent years I have noticed the same thing in other clothing lines, not just with these jeans. Gotta try them all on almost all the time now to be sure they fit right. That’s the way it is these days.Otherwise, these are the same good fitting, durable and comfortable jeans as always. I wear either a 10 or 12 in pants in general these days. The recent pair in size 10 was a bit too snug in the waist, 12 is perfect. Even though I went up a size this time, they fit fairly well all over, just a tad bit looser in hips and legs than I’d prefer Oh well. (I’m in my 60’s, 5’6”, 160, and have that awful spare tire and then some now that…no matter what I try to do…refuses to deflate or diminish. Really disappointing when you’re used to fitting in an 8/10.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Look Good
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable and great fit. The stretch is nice. Travel well and launder nicely. Like everything about them.
Amanda design are great for women who have a waist. Love the higher waist line. I have bought this style for a few years now.
Washed nicely. Comfortable fit. Sizing correct
Perfect fit and the fact you can order according to your height short or long
Ordered for my mother. Perfect fit and rich denim color. Very well made. Thank you
I like the fitting it's perfect
